edu.uml.cs.isense.comm
Class API

java.lang.Object
  edu.uml.cs.isense.comm.API

public class API
extends java.lang.Object

A class which allows Android applications to interface with the iSENSE website. Given a singleton instance of this class, functions can be called through an AsyncTask.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static API getInstance()
Gets the one instance of the API class (instead of recreating a new one every time). Functions as a constructor if the current instance is null.

Returns:
current or new API

createSession

public boolean createSession(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
Log in to iSENSE. After calling this function, authenticated API functions will work properly.

Parameters:
username - The username of the user to log in as
password - The password of the user to log in as
Returns:
True if login succeeds, false if it doesn't

deleteSession

public void deleteSession()
Log out of iSENSE

getProjects

public java.util.ArrayList<RProject> getProjects(int page,
                                                 int perPage,
                                                 boolean descending,
                                                 int sortOn,
                                                 java.lang.String search)
Retrieves multiple projects off of iSENSE.

Parameters:
page - Which page of results to start from. 1-indexed
perPage - How many results to display per page
descending - Whether to display the results in descending order (true) or ascending order (false)
search - A string to search all projects for
Returns:
An ArrayList of Project objects

getProject

public RProject getProject(int projectId)
Retrieves information about a single project on iSENSE

Parameters:
projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve
Returns:
A Project object

createProject

public int createProject(java.lang.String projectName,
                         java.util.ArrayList<RProjectField> fields)
Creates a new project on iSENSE. The Field objects in the second parameter must have at a type and a name, and can optionally have a unit. This is an authenticated function.

Parameters:
projectName - The name of the new project to be created
fields - An ArrayList of field objects that will become the fields on iSENSE.
Returns:
The ID of the created project

deleteProject

public int deleteProject(int projectId)
Deletes a project on iSENSE. Logged in user must have permission on the site to do this

Parameters:
projectId - The ID of the project on iSENSE to be deleted
Returns:
1 if the deletion succeeds.

getProjectFields

public java.util.ArrayList<RProjectField> getProjectFields(int projectId)
Gets all of the fields associated with a project.

Parameters:
projectId - The unique ID of the project whose fields you want to see
Returns:
An ArrayList of ProjectField objects

public java.util.ArrayList<RTutorial> getTutorials(int page,
                                                   int perPage,
                                                   boolean descending,
                                                   java.lang.String search)
Retrieves multiple tutorials off of iSENSE

Parameters:
page - Which page of results to start from. 1-indexed
perPage - How many results to display per page
descending - Whether to display the results in descending order (true) or ascending order (false)
search - A string to search all tutorials for
Returns:
An ArrayList of Tutorial objects

Get a tutorial from iSENSE

Parameters:
tutorialId - The ID of the tutorial to retrieve
Returns:
A Tutorial object

getUsers

public java.util.ArrayList<RPerson> getUsers(int page,
                                             int perPage,
                                             boolean descending,
                                             java.lang.String search)
Retrieves a list of users on iSENSE This is an admin only function and requires that the current user be an admin

Parameters:
page - Which page of users to start the request from
perPage - How many users per page to perform the search with
descending - Whether the list of users should be in descending order or not
search - A string to search all users for
Returns:
A list of Person objects

getUser

public RPerson getUser(int id)
Gets a user off of iSENSE

Parameters:
id - The id of the user to retrieve
Returns:
A Person object

getNewsEntries

public java.util.ArrayList<RNews> getNewsEntries(int page,
                                                 int perPage,
                                                 boolean descending,
                                                 java.lang.String search)
Retrieves a list of news articles on iSENSE

Parameters:
page - Which page of news to start the request from
perPage - How many entries per page to perform the search with
descending - Whether the list of articles should be in descending order or not
search - A string to search all articles for
Returns:
A list of News objects

getNewsEntry

public RNews getNewsEntry(int newsId)
Gets a news article off iSENSE

Parameters:
newsId - The id of the news entry to retrieve
Returns:
A News object

getDataSet

public RDataSet getDataSet(int dataSetId)
Retrieve a data set from iSENSE, with it's data field filled in The internal data set will be converted to column-major format, to make it compatible with the uploadDataSet function

Parameters:
dataSetId - The unique ID of the data set to retrieve from iSENSE
Returns:
A DataSet object

getDataSets

public java.util.ArrayList<RDataSet> getDataSets(int projectId)
Gets all the data sets associated with a project The data sets returned by this function do not have their data field filled.

Parameters:
projectId - The project ID whose data sets you want
Returns:
An ArrayList of Data Set objects, with their data fields left null

uploadDataSet

public int uploadDataSet(int projectId,
                         JSONObject data,
                         java.lang.String datasetName)
Deprecated. - Will go away, to be replaced by jsonDataUpload Uploads a new data set to a project on iSENSE

Parameters:
projectId - The ID of the project to upload data to
data - The data to be uploaded. Must be in column-major format to upload correctly
datasetName - The name of the dataset
Returns:
The integer ID of the newly uploaded dataset, or -1 if upload fails

jsonDataUpload

public int jsonDataUpload(int projectId,
                          JSONObject data,
                          java.lang.String datasetName)
Uploads a new data set to a project on iSENSE

Parameters:
projectId - The ID of the project to upload data to
data - The data to be uploaded. Must be in column-major format to upload correctly
datasetName - The name of the dataset
Returns:
The integer ID of the newly uploaded dataset, or -1 if upload fails

appendDataSetData

public void appendDataSetData(int dataSetId,
                              JSONObject newData)
Append new rows of data to the end of an existing data set

Parameters:
dataSetId - The ID of the data set to append to
newData - The new data to append

uploadCSV

public int uploadCSV(int projectId,
                     java.io.File csvToUpload,
                     java.lang.String datasetName)
Uploads a CSV file to iSENSE as a new data set

Parameters:
projectId - The ID of the project to upload data to
csvToUpload - The CSV as a File object
datasetName - The name of the dataset
Returns:
The ID of the data set created on iSENSE

uploadProjectMedia

public int uploadProjectMedia(int projectId,
                              java.io.File mediaToUpload)
Uploads a file to the media section of a project

Parameters:
projectId - The project ID to upload to
mediaToUpload - The file to upload
Returns:
The media object ID for the media uploaded or -1 if upload fails

uploadDataSetMedia

public int uploadDataSetMedia(int dataSetId,
                              java.io.File mediaToUpload)
Uploads a file to the media section of a data set

Parameters:
dataSetId - The data set ID to upload to
mediaToUpload - The file to upload
Returns:
The media object ID for the media uploaded or -1 if upload fails

getCurrentUser

public RPerson getCurrentUser()

useDev

public void useDev(boolean use)
Switched the API instance between using the public iSENSE and the developer iSENSE

Parameters:
use - Whether or not to use the developer iSENSE

isUsingDevMode

public boolean isUsingDevMode()
Returns whether or not the API is using dev mode.

Returns:
True if the API is using the development website, false otherwise.

setBaseUrl

public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String newUrl)
Directly set the base URL, rather than using the dev or production URLs

Parameters:
newUrl - The URL to use as a base

rowsToCols

public JSONObject rowsToCols(JSONObject original)
Reformats a row-major JSONObject into a column-major one

Parameters:
original - The row-major formatted JSONObject
Returns:
A column-major reformatted version of the original JSONObject

getVersion

public java.lang.String getVersion()
Gets the current API version

Returns:
API version in MAJOR.MINOR format
